parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
From lego; something said; by implication, a topic, also reasoning or motive; by extension, a computation; specially, the Divine Expression.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Accusative Masculine Singular
str2: To remain, abide, stay, wait; with acc: I wait for, await. A primary verb; to stay.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
No, not. Also ouk, and ouch a primary word; the absolute negative adverb; no or not.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: From pistis; to have faith, i.e. Credit; by implication, to entrust.
That, that one there, yonder. From ekei; that one (neuter) thing); often intensified by the article prefixed.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From apo and stello; set apart, i.e. to send out literally or figuratively.
